title: J. A. Jance eBooks Collection
description:
Judith Ann (J. A.) Jance (born October 27, 1944) is an American author of mystery and horror novels. She writes at least three series of novels, centering on retired Seattle Police Department officer J. P. Beaumont, Arizona county sheriff Joanna Brady, and Ali Reynolds. The Beaumont and Brady series intersect in the novel Partner in Crime, which is both the 16th Beaumount mystery and the 10th Brady mystery. They intersect again in Fire and Ice.

Walker Family
Former Sheriff Brandon Walker and his wife author Diana Ladd live in Tucson, Arizona and are interconnected with tribal members living on the TohonoO'dham reservations.

2. Kiss of the Bees (2000)
3. Day of the Dead (2004)

Joanna Brady is a devoted mother and the first female Sheriff of Cochise County, Arizona.
